widget.name: Biography
widget.preload: locals[:biography_link] = "/biography" unless (locals[:person_id].to_i > 0) locals[:person_id] = Roxiware::Param::Param.application_param_val("people", "default_biography") unless (locals[:person_id].to_i > 0) puts "PERSON ID #{locals[:person_id]}" locals[:person_bio] = Roxiware::Person.find(locals[:person_id].to_i) locals[:biography_link] ||= person_path(locals[:person_bio].seo_index) puts "biography link #{locals[:biography_link]}" locals[:person_bio].present?
widget.render_view: <%= person_bio.full_name %>
